maya/beastmayaplugin/src/beastwrappers/beasttargetentitywrapper.cpp
/*

#include "beastwrappers/beasttargetentitywrapper.h"
#include <beastapi/beasttargetentity.h>

namespace beastmaya {

void BeastTargetEntity::setBakeResolution( int width, int height )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetBakeResolution(m_obj, width, height));
}

void BeastTargetEntity::setBakeUVSet( ILBConstString uvName )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetBakeUVSet(m_obj, uvName));
}

void BeastTargetEntity::setTexelScale(float scale)
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBSetTexelScale(m_obj, scale));
}

void BeastTargetEntity::getAtlasInformation(int32& frameBufferIndex, float& offsetX, float& offsetY, float& scaleX, float& scaleY) {
        ILBVec2 offset;
        ILBVec2 scale;
        BEAST_CALL(ILBGetAtlasInformation(m_obj, &frameBufferIndex, &offset, &scale));

        offsetX = offset.x;
        offsetY = offset.y;
        scaleX = scale.x;
        scaleY= scale.y;
}

void BeastTargetEntity::changeTargetEntityType( ILBTargetEntityType type )
{
        BEAST_CALL(ILBChangeTargetEntityType(m_obj, type));
}

}
